subtitles: to cook filet mignon start by letting the steak come to room temperature for 30 minutes and then seasoning it with salt and pepper next heat some oil in a skillet over medium-high heat once the oil is hot place the steak in the pan and cook the first side for four minutes then flip the steak over and cook the other side for four minutes finally transfer the steak to a baking sheet and cook it in the oven for five to eight minutes at 425 degrees Fahrenheitto cook filet mignon start by letting the steak come to room temperature for 30 minutes and then seasoning it with salt and pepper next heat some oil in a skillet over medium-high heat once the oil is hot place the steak in the pan and cook the first side for four minutes then flip the steak over and cook the other side for four minutes finally transfer the steak to a baking sheet and cook it in the oven for five to eight minutes at 425 degrees Fahrenheit

subtitles: one way to cook fresh green beans is to add them to a pot of boiling water then turn the heat down and let the green beans simmer for four minutes or until they're tender and crisp you can also steamed green beans by cooking them in a steamer basket over a pot of boiling water for two minutes if you're in a rush put the green beans in a microwave-safe bowl and cover it with plastic wrap then microwave the green beans on high for three minutesone way to cook fresh green beans is to add them to a pot of boiling water then turn the heat down and let the green beans simmer for four minutes or until they're tender and crisp you can also steamed green beans by cooking them in a steamer basket over a pot of boiling water for two minutes if you're in a rush put the green beans in a microwave-safe bowl and cover it with plastic wrap then microwave the green beans on high for three minutes

title: How to Cook Frozen Lobster Tails
description:
Lobster tails make a decadent appetizer or entrée and using frozen tails means you can enjoy them any time of year! For the best texture, it's important to defrost the lobster tails since cooking frozen tails will make tough, chewy lobster. Then, you can broil, grill, or boil them. Mix together butter flavored with herbs or freshly cracked pepper to serve with your lobster tails and enjoy!

Video Transcript: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Frozen-Lobster-Tails#videotranscript

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to cook frozen lobster tails first transfer the tails to the fridge one day before you want to cook them so they thaw if you're short on time place the lobster tails in a resealable plastic bag and submerge them in cold water until they thaw changing out the water every 30 minutes once they're defrosted use kitchen shears to cut through the top shell of each tail stop when you reach the tail fin now gently pull apart the sides of the shell to expose the meat without taking the shell off completely bring a large pot of water to a boil and add in the thawed tails once the water starts boiling again reduce the heat to a simmer and cover the pot cook four ounce lobster tails for five minutes adding one more minute for each additional ounce transfer the tails to a bowl of ice water so they stop cooking then drain finally set the tails on a platter for serving and drizzle with melted butterto cook frozen lobster tails first transfer the tails to the fridge one day before you want to cook them so they thaw if you're short on time place the lobster tails in a resealable plastic bag and submerge them in cold water until they thaw changing out the water every 30 minutes once they're defrosted use kitchen shears to cut through the top shell of each tail stop when you reach the tail fin now gently pull apart the sides of the shell to expose the meat without taking the shell off completely bring a large pot of water to a boil and add in the thawed tails once the water starts boiling again reduce the heat to a simmer and cover the pot cook four ounce lobster tails for five minutes adding one more minute for each additional ounce transfer the tails to a bowl of ice water so they stop cooking then drain finally set the tails on a platter for serving and drizzle with melted butter

title: How to Cook Meatballs
description:

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to make meatballs first beat one egg in a mixing bowl add one pound or one half kilogram of ground beef to the bowl along with one quarter cup 25 grams of bread crumbs then sprinkle in one half teaspoon 2.5 grams of salt and 1 4 teaspoon 1.25 grams of pepper you can also add diced onions parsley garlic powder oregano paprika or any of your other favorite seasonings mix the ingredients together by hand until everything is thoroughly combined use your hands to scoop up the ground beef and compact it into balls that are roughly 1 inch 2.5 centimeters in size set each of the meatballs down on a sheet of parchment paper next preheat your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit 175 degrees celsius and spread a thin layer of olive oil across the bottom of the baking dish line the baking dish with the meatballs so there's 1 inch 2.5 centimeters of space between each meatball bake the meatballs for 15 minutes finally remove the dish from the oven flip the meatballs and bake them for 5 more minutesto make meatballs first beat one egg in a mixing bowl add one pound or one half kilogram of ground beef to the bowl along with one quarter cup 25 grams of bread crumbs then sprinkle in one half teaspoon 2.5 grams of salt and 1 4 teaspoon 1.25 grams of pepper you can also add diced onions parsley garlic powder oregano paprika or any of your other favorite seasonings mix the ingredients together by hand until everything is thoroughly combined use your hands to scoop up the ground beef and compact it into balls that are roughly 1 inch 2.5 centimeters in size set each of the meatballs down on a sheet of parchment paper next preheat your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit 175 degrees celsius and spread a thin layer of olive oil across the bottom of the baking dish line the baking dish with the meatballs so there's 1 inch 2.5 centimeters of space between each meatball bake the meatballs for 15 minutes finally remove the dish from the oven flip the meatballs and bake them for 5 more minutes

title: How to Cook Quinoa in the Microwave
description:

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook quinoa in the microwave first rinse 1 cup or 200 grams of quinoa in a fine mesh strainer to remove any bitter tasting residue then transfer the quinoa to a microwave-safe container and add 2 cups or 475 milliliters of water cover the container with a lid or plate then microwave the quinoa for 6 minutes remove it from the microwave and stir finally microwave the quinoa for 2 minutes or until all the water is absorbed fluff the quinoa with a fork before servingto cook quinoa in the microwave first rinse 1 cup or 200 grams of quinoa in a fine mesh strainer to remove any bitter tasting residue then transfer the quinoa to a microwave-safe container and add 2 cups or 475 milliliters of water cover the container with a lid or plate then microwave the quinoa for 6 minutes remove it from the microwave and stir finally microwave the quinoa for 2 minutes or until all the water is absorbed fluff the quinoa with a fork before serving

subtitles: to cook sausages first add them to a large pot and fill it with enough water to cover them then heat the sausages over medium-high heat until the water starts to simmer which will cook them through and make them tender next remove the sausages from the pot set them aside and heat some oil in a pan over high heat once it's hot add the sausages to the pan and sear them on each side until they're crispy transfer the sausages to a plate and enjoy if you're cooking sausages to add to sandwiches or another dish cut the links into halves or coins before searing them in the panto cook sausages first add them to a large pot and fill it with enough water to cover them then heat the sausages over medium-high heat until the water starts to simmer which will cook them through and make them tender next remove the sausages from the pot set them aside and heat some oil in a pan over high heat once it's hot add the sausages to the pan and sear them on each side until they're crispy transfer the sausages to a plate and enjoy if you're cooking sausages to add to sandwiches or another dish cut the links into halves or coins before searing them in the pan

title: How to Cook Zoodles
description:
Learn How to Cook Zoodles with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Zoodles

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: you can cook zoodles by boiling them on the stove microwaving them or sauteing them to boil zoodles on the stove fill a pot with enough water to cover the zoodles completely bring the water to a boil and add the zoodles to the pot cook for one to three minutes stirring occasionally if you're cooking more than four servings of zoodles consider cooking them in batches make sure to cook the zoodles for no more than five minutes since zoodles can easily become overcooked and mushy when the time is up drain the zoodles in a colander add your favorite sauce and enjoy if you prefer to microwave the zoodles first place them in a large microwave safe bowl then microwave the zoodles uncovered for one minute on regular heat test the zoodles for crispness if they're not done eat them in thirty-second increments until they're the consistency you like finally if you want to saute the zoodles heat one tablespoon of oil or butter in a saucepan over medium heat add the zoodles to the pan and let them cook for one to three minutes stirring occasionally remove the zoodles from the heat and serve immediatelyyou can cook zoodles by boiling them on the stove microwaving them or sauteing them to boil zoodles on the stove fill a pot with enough water to cover the zoodles completely bring the water to a boil and add the zoodles to the pot cook for one to three minutes stirring occasionally if you're cooking more than four servings of zoodles consider cooking them in batches make sure to cook the zoodles for no more than five minutes since zoodles can easily become overcooked and mushy when the time is up drain the zoodles in a colander add your favorite sauce and enjoy if you prefer to microwave the zoodles first place them in a large microwave safe bowl then microwave the zoodles uncovered for one minute on regular heat test the zoodles for crispness if they're not done eat them in thirty-second increments until they're the consistency you like finally if you want to saute the zoodles heat one tablespoon of oil or butter in a saucepan over medium heat add the zoodles to the pan and let them cook for one to three minutes stirring occasionally remove the zoodles from the heat and serve immediately
